    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(ChannelConversion channelConversion)
        Register a new channelConversion in this instance, which effectively adds an edge.

      • findMinimumCostJunction

        public Junction findMinimumCostJunction​(OutputSlot<?> output,
                                        java.util.List<InputSlot<?>> destInputSlots,
                                        OptimizationContext optimizationContext,
                                        boolean isRequestBreakpoint)
        Finds the minimum tree Junction (w.r.t. TimeEstimates that connects the given OutputSlot to the destInputSlots.
        Parameters:
        output - OutputSlot of an ExecutionOperator that should be consumed
        destInputSlots - InputSlots of ExecutionOperators that should receive data from the output
        optimizationContext - describes the above mentioned ExecutionOperator key figures
        isRequestBreakpoint - whether a breakpoint-capable Channel should be inserted if possible
        Returns:
        a Junction or null if none could be found

      • findMinimumCostJunction

        public Junction findMinimumCostJunction​(OutputSlot<?> output,
                                        java.util.Collection<Channel> openChannels,
                                        java.util.List<InputSlot<?>> destInputSlots,
                                        OptimizationContext optimizationContext)
        Finds the minimum tree Junction (w.r.t. TimeEstimates that connects the given OutputSlot to the destInputSlots.
        Parameters:
        output - OutputSlot of an ExecutionOperator that should be consumed
        openChannels - existing Channels that must be part of the tree or null
        destInputSlots - InputSlots of ExecutionOperators that should receive data from the output
        optimizationContext - describes the above mentioned ExecutionOperator key figures
        Returns:
        a Junction or null if none could be found
